intro.p: The GStreamer team is happy to announce the first release in the 0.8.x stable series of the GStreamer Monkey's Audio Plugin.
The 0.8.x series is a stable series aimed at end users. It is not API or ABI compatible with the stable 0.6.x series. It is, however, parallel installable with the 0.6.x series.
This module contains a plugin to decode files in the Monkey's Audio format, which typically have the .ape extension.

features.feature: Works with 0.8.x of GStreamer and GStreamer Plugins
